item.title: Get started
item.description: Get startedThis guide is meant for organizations setting up their first load balancer. If you already have active load balancers, refer to Basic tasks for general help or Additional configurations for more advanced setups. ​â€‹ Prerequisites Multiple servers, either physical or cloud-based. Access to Load Balancing, available as an add-on for any type of account. Load balancer hostname: The hostname for which the Cloudflare Load Balancer will manage traffic. The default hostname is the root hostname.
